thread.title: How the A’s Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Oakland
thread.title_full: How the A’s Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Oakland - WSJ

author: Jared Diamond
title: How the A’s Learned to Stop Worrying and Love Oakland
text:
Oakland sports fans can be forgiven for having abandonment issues.
The NBA’s Golden State Warriors will move in 2019 to a shiny new arena in San Francisco’s Mission Bay neighborhood after more than four decades in the East Bay. The NFL’s Oakland Raiders have filed paperwork to relocate to Las Vegas—a move that, if approved, would mark the second time the franchise has fled the city.

But baseball’s Oakland A’s? Their slogan for...
